metadata.title: CVE-2020-36120 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow in the "sixel_encoder_encode_bytes" function of Libsixelv1.8.6 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
